member.name: IMAGEHLP_GET_TYPE_INFO_PARAMS
member.summary: Contains type information for a module.

member.name: IMAGEHLP_GET_TYPE_INFO_PARAMS.SizeOfStruct
member.summary: The size of this structure, in bytes.

summary.para: This member can be one of the following values.

listheader.description: Retrieve information about the children of the specified types, not the types themselves.
Do not cache the data for later retrievals. It is good to use this flag if you will not be requesting the information again.

member.name: IMAGEHLP_GET_TYPE_INFO_PARAMS.NumIds
member.summary: The number of elements specified in the TypeIds array.

member.name: IMAGEHLP_GET_TYPE_INFO_PARAMS.TagFilter
member.summary: The filter for return values. For example, set this member to 1 << SymTagData to return only results with a symbol tag of SymTagData. For a list of tags, see the SymTagEnum type defined in Dbghelp.h

member.name: IMAGEHLP_GET_TYPE_INFO_PARAMS.NumReqs
member.summary: The number of elements specified in the arrays specified in the ReqKinds, ReqOffsets, and ReqSizes members. These arrays must be the same size.

member.name: IMAGEHLP_GET_TYPE_INFO_PARAMS.ReqKinds
member.summary: An array of information types to be requested. Each element is one of the enumeration values in the enumeration type.

member.name: IMAGEHLP_GET_TYPE_INFO_PARAMS.ReqOffsets
member.summary: An array of offsets that specify where to store the data for each request within each element of Buffer array.

member.name: IMAGEHLP_GET_TYPE_INFO_PARAMS.ReqSizes
member.summary: The size of each data request, in bytes. The required sizes are described in .

member.name: IMAGEHLP_GET_TYPE_INFO_PARAMS.ReqStride
member.summary: The number of bytes for each element in the Buffer array.

member.name: IMAGEHLP_GET_TYPE_INFO_PARAMS.BufferSize
member.summary: The size of the Buffer array, in bytes.

member.name: IMAGEHLP_GET_TYPE_INFO_PARAMS.Buffer
member.summary: An array of records used for storing query results. Each record is separated by ReqStride bytes. Each type for which data is to be retrieved requires one record in the array. Within each record, there are NumReqs pieces of data stored as the result of individual queries. The data is stored within the record according to the offsets specified in ReqOffsets. The format of the data depends on the value of the ReqKinds member in use.

member.name: IMAGEHLP_GET_TYPE_INFO_PARAMS.EntriesMatched
member.summary: The number of type entries that match the filter.

member.name: IMAGEHLP_GET_TYPE_INFO_PARAMS.EntriesFilled
member.summary: The number of elements in the Buffer array that received results.

member.name: IMAGEHLP_GET_TYPE_INFO_PARAMS.TagsFound
member.summary: A bitmask indicating all tag bits encountered during the search operation.

member.name: IMAGEHLP_GET_TYPE_INFO_PARAMS.AllReqsValid
member.summary: A bitmask indicate the bit-wise AND of all ReqsValid fields.

member.name: IMAGEHLP_GET_TYPE_INFO_PARAMS.NumReqsValid
member.summary: The size of ReqsValid, in elements.

member.name: IMAGEHLP_GET_TYPE_INFO_PARAMS.ReqsValid
member.summary: A bitmask indexed by Buffer element index that indicates which request data is valid. This member can be NULL.
